derivation: from ( or , akin to G2240 (ἱκανός)) (to arrive);
kjv_def: able, + content, enough, good, great, large, long (while), many, meet, much, security, sore, sufficient, worthy
strongs_def: competent (as if coming in season), i.e. ample (in amount) or fit (in character)
outline:
1. sufficient
    1. many enough, enough
    2. sufficient in ability, i.e. meet, fit
